column4: I run du, it shows that my disk is 100% full, how do I go about to delete some files and make some room?
actuall I run df, it shows that my root directory is full, and I only have one partitions for my installation, my questions is what kind of files, I could remove to make room for my system.
you could start with Open Office, it can be replaced with Abiword and Gnumeric.
